1.title: Pilot
1.plot: Happy meets Juan at their friend's wedding and they accidentally meet again at the most awkward way.

2.title: May spark
2.plot: Juan beats the holduppers who try to snatch Happy's handbag.

3.title: Juan Is the One
3.plot: Juan and Happy dine in a Chinese restaurant after the incident outside the church.

4.title: Hopia si Happy
4.plot: Happy believes that she is in a relationship with Juan, but for Juan having a girlfriend is never a priority.

5.title: Seen Zone
5.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

6.title: Abangerz
6.plot: Happy attends their class reunion and meets again her high school best friend Obet who is now known as Bob.

7.title: Juan Who Got Away
7.plot: Juan and Happy were caught kissing. Bob finally admits to Happy that he came back from the US for her.

8.title: My Adobo for Life
8.plot: When Happy decided to end the relationship with Juan because of his womanizing, he half-heartedly proposes in order to keep her.

9.title: Civil War
9.plot: Realizing he made a terrible act, Juan cooks up nasty plans so that Happy will call off their wedding when his grandparents meet her parents in a family dinner.

10.title: Juan Wild Night
10.plot: Happy catches Juan making out with other girls in a bachelor party organized by Bob.

11.title: Watch We Weep
11.plot: Happy`s family learned about Juan`s misdeed while Bob started to court Happy.

12.title: Change Is Coming
12.plot: Juan asks Happy's sister to organize a meet up so he can formally propose to her.

13.title: Wedding oo wedding hindi
13.plot: The biggest day for Juan and Happy. Will Juan be able to say 'I do'?

14.title: Ligo na u lapit na me
14.plot: Bob intends to make a scene and prove that Juan is a womanizer.

15.title: Bagong dilig
15.plot: Will the couple be able to spend a romantic night together?

16.title: Di puro sarap
16.plot: Happy's married life is spiced by Juan`s grandparents especially Mamu.

17.title: Oh Triple Tukso
17.plot: Living with the in-laws made Happy think that Juan will never change just like his grandpa who is still a womanizer despite his age.

18.title: Agatha Is Coming
18.plot: Juan meets a possible business partner, Agatha while Happy resigned from her job to keep an eye on her husband.

19.title: Bumper to Bumper
19.plot: Happy struggles in the kitchen to be able to cokk Juan's favorite Adobo. Meanwhile, Bob and Agatha have suspicious plans, who happen to be old friends.

20.title: Babababra
20.plot: Happy found Agatha's underwear in Juan's laptop bag.

21.title: Ako Happy, siya Darling
21.plot: After discovering Agatha's underwear in Juan's laptop bag, Happy continues to be more suspicious on Juan.

22.title: Sa pula sa puti
22.plot: Family and friends are invited in the housewarming celebration of Juan and Happy's new home.

23.title: Bombahin mo Juan
23.plot: Agatha treats Juan to dinner for helping her change a flat tire.

24.title: Gimme a Baby
24.plot: Happy and Juan consult a doctor to ensure they are both healthy for a baby.

25.title: Babymaking
25.plot: Juan and Happy try all the advice given to them by family and friends as to how they can have a baby.

26.title: We Are Not Bagay
26.plot: Happy introduces Kat-kat to Juan. The couple spend the day in the orphange but was interrupted by the news from their OB-Gyne.

27.title: Magkakababy ako
27.plot: Tension between Juan and Happy's in-laws escalate over dinner. Juan and Happy attend a dance ritual for fertility rites.

28.title: Isa pang round
28.plot: Tension rises between Happy and Joy, her older sister. Agatha ups her game by getting close with Juan.

29.title: Kulang sa dilig
29.plot: Happy gives up having a child of their own so he convinces Juan to consider adoption. Juan gets into trouble with his friends and spends a night in prison.

30.title: Bitin na bitin sayo
30.plot: Happy prioritizes the adoption process taking up so much of her time, depriving Juan of bedroom intimacy. Agatha invites Juan out and tries flirting with him again. Juan struggles resisting the temptation.

31.title: Hot na hot
31.plot: Juan and Happy's LQ (love quarrel) continues and Bob instructs Agatha to work more on seducing Juan.

32.title: Temptation of Juan
32.plot: Happy follows Juan to Tagaytay for a surprise but she gets surprised instead. She found Juan in bed with a woman.

33.title: Asawa Exit
33.plot: After catching Agatha and Juan in the act, Happy decides to move out and live with her parents.

34.title: Akin lang asawa ko
34.plot: Happy visits the orphanage to forget about her problems but Juan makes a move to ask for forgiveness.

35.title: Torn si Juan
35.plot: Happy and Juan together with the gang goes to a resort for some r&r but their weekend getaway gets interrupted.

36.title: Dibdibang laban
36.plot: Agatha really never gives up and tries to seduce Juan again.

37.title: Don't Throw Us Away
37.plot: Bob fuels Happy's suspicions about Agatha and she confronts her. Agatha earns a point as Juan tells Happy he needs space.

38.title: Walang iJuanan
38.plot: Happy and Juan is on the brink of a major decision.

39.title: It's Complicated
39.plot: Agatha takes advantage of the broken hearted Juan.

40.title: Throwback Resbak
40.plot: Juan and Happy start moving on and build lives away from each other.

41.title: In a Relationship
41.plot: Happy and Juan reunite in the wedding of Mamu and Papi. Happy discovered Juan's new relationship with Agatha.

42.title: Struggle Is Real
42.plot: Bob confessed to Happy his true feelings.

43.title: Paligayahin mo ako Juan
43.plot: Happy has decided to pursue adopting a child but she needs Juan's help.

44.title: Sumakabilang bahay
44.plot: Happy visits Juan to discuss her adoption plans but Juan has second thoughts.

45.title: Tara sa biglang liko
45.plot: Due to bad weather, Juan and Happy get stranded and decided to check in a motel for a night.

46.title: Ay madulas
46.plot: Juan compares Agatha with his ex-wife Happy.

47.title: Bahay-bahayan
47.plot: Juan and Happy's adoption papers are finally approved.

48.title: Tabi tayong matulog
48.plot: Juan and Happy continue to hide their real situation from Didith and Kat-kat while Juan continue to give alibis to Agatha.

49.title: Affected sa kiss
49.plot: Didith doubts Juan and Happy's relationship. Good thing Juan shows up at their house when she visits Kat-kat.

50.title: Pigil na pigil
50.plot: Happy and Juan are barely keeping their hands off each other when Katkat made a very surprising request.

51.title: Kabog na kabog
51.plot: Juan gets caught in between a female client and Agatha's jealousy.

52.title: May naganap ba
52.plot: Juan struggles coming to two occassions at the same time, one for Agatha's birthday and the other to Kat-kat's welcoming party.

53.title: Happy kay Happy
53.plot: Juan admits he is still in love with Happy.

54.title: Pak na pag-ibig
54.plot: Agatha catches Juan lying and threatens informing DSWD about his true relationship with Happy.

55.title: Kabugan ng taon
55.plot: Agatha discovers Happy and Juan's arrangement on Kat-kat's adoption.

56.title: Juan in the Middle
56.plot: After Didith's regular visit to Kat-kat, Agatha suddenly shows up and speaks with her outside Happy's house.

57.title: Na fall ang pa-fall
57.plot: Agatha demands that Juan must file an annulment from Happy so they can get married.

58.title: Pasabog bog bog
58.plot: In favour of Agatha, Juan tells Happy that he wants an annulment.

59.title: Do Not Disturb
59.plot: Agatha moves in beside Happy's house.

60.title: Happy na smart pa
60.plot: A stray dog poops in front of Agatha's house until she steps on it which pleases Happy.

61.title: Don't Me Juan
61.plot: Happy finally dumps Bob as she is not ready for a new relationship.

62.title: Zooper Happy Trip
62.plot: Agatha finds a way to stop Juan from bringing Kat-kat to the zoo.

63.title: Coffee, Tea, or Me
63.plot: Bob rescues Kat-kat from the gorilla. Will he get close with Happy because of this?

64.title: Hubad na truth
64.plot: Juan gets saddened to see Bob, Happy and Kat-kat and Happy like one happy family.

65.title: Babe asan ka kagabi
65.plot: Kat-kat reveals to Mamu what she made her sad.

66.title: Posas in Love
66.plot: Juan and Happy wake up with their hands handcuffed together and the key can only be found in the most special place for them.

67.title: Babe pa kiss pa hug
67.plot: Juan and Happy are in search for the key. They end up going to places that matter to them.

68.title: Shower Me with Roses
68.plot: Juan finally confesses his true feelings.

69.title: Uso pa ba ang harana
69.plot: Juan does his best to win Happy back but he faces a new challenge - Sabina.

70.title: Choose Happyness
70.plot: Agatha begs Juan not to leave him but he is determined in winning Happy back.

71.title: Happy na nga ba
71.plot: Agatha gets in the way of the approval of Kat-kat's adoption papers.

72.title: Gusto ko happy ka
72.plot: Didith and the social welfare staff bring Katkat back to the orphanage.

73.title: Family Goals
73.plot: Juan tries to make Happy smile again by bringing her to the orphanage to see Kat-kat.

74.title: Super Juan
74.plot: Juan and Happy disguise themselves as mimes in a field trip sponsored by Bob. Kat-kat gets into an accident.

75.title: Sino daddy mo
75.plot: Kat-kat, Happy and Juan reunite and enjoy being a complete family again while Agatha discovers she is pregnant.

76.title: Wow bawi wow
76.plot: Agatha confesses she is carrying Juan's child.

77.title: Fact ganern
77.plot: After breaking the news of impregnating another woman, Juan discovers the truth about Agatha's child.

78.title: Finding Happy
78.plot: Juan is rushed to the hospital due to an accident.

79.title: It's a Juanderful Life
79.plot: Juan gets paralyzed because of the accident. He drives Happy and Kat-kat away from his life.

80.title: Happy Ending
80.plot: Juan and Happy get a happy ending.

imdb.plot outline: A naughty,romantic comedy about a man who has commitment issues and a hopelessly romantic woman. Their differences take its toll in their marriage that they decided to separate but a pending adoption prevented them from pursuing it. So the couple pretended to be happily married until the end of the supervised trial custody. Will their pretensions lead to one happy love story?
imdb.title: Juan Happy Love Story
plot: A naughty,romantic comedy about a man who has commitment issues and a hopelessly romantic woman. Their differences take its toll in their marriage that they decided to separate but a pending adoption prevented them from pursuing it. So the couple pretended to be happily married until the end of the supervised trial custody. Will their pretensions lead to one happy love story?
